1.title: Hardware: Server temperature warning
1.description: Server reporting elevated temperature. CPU temp at 75°C. Cooling system operating normally. Monitoring for escalation. Non-critical.

2.title: Network: Intermittent connectivity issues
2.description: Sporadic network timeout errors reported. Issue appears intermittent. Network monitoring shows no major anomalies. Investigating potential route optimization.

3.title: User inquiry: Feature question
3.description: User inquiry regarding functionality. Feature request for enhanced reporting. Standard support response provided.

4.title: Network: Intermittent connectivity issues
4.description: Sporadic network timeout errors reported. Issue appears intermittent. Network monitoring shows no major anomalies. Investigating potential route optimization.

5.title: Critical: Database unavailable
5.description:
CRITICAL DATABASE FAILURE

Impact: All database operations failing
Dependent Services: 5 services affected

Error Status:
- Primary database instance crashed at 12:17
- Connection pool exhausted - max connections reached
- Automatic failover initiated to read replica
- Transaction logs corrupted - recovery in progress

DBA Actions:
- Point-in-time recovery initiated
- Analyzing transaction logs
- Expected RTO: 79 minutes

11.title: Software failure: Core application down
11.description:
CRITICAL SOFTWARE FAILURE

Impact: Service completely unavailable - all user requests failing
Users Affected: 151+

Error Details:
- NullPointerException in authentication module
- Application crash detected at 07:09
- Stack trace indicates memory corruption in user session handler
- All active sessions terminated

Immediate Actions:
- Failover to backup instance initiated
- Development team notified for emergency patch

12.title: Complete connectivity loss to datacenter
12.description:
CRITICAL NETWORK OUTAGE

Impact: Complete network connectivity loss
Users Affected: 1889+

Network Status:
- All traffic to datacenter timing out
- BGP route flapping detected
- Multiple availability zones affected
- Primary and backup paths both down

Network Team Actions:
- ISP escalation opened
- Traffic being rerouted through backup datacenter
- Estimated restoration: 2-4 hours

13.title: User inquiry: Feature question
13.description: User inquiry regarding functionality. Feature request for enhanced reporting. Standard support response provided.

14.title: High: Performance degradation on application
14.description:
Software Performance Issue

Impact: Slow response times affecting user experience
Users Affected: 75

Issue:
- API response time increased from 200ms to 8s
- Database connection pool exhaustion detected
- Memory leak suspected in background job processor
- Error rate: 30%

Investigation:
- Analyzing heap dumps
- Reviewing recent code deployments

36.title: Disk failure on production server
36.description:
CRITICAL HARDWARE FAILURE

Impact: Complete system failure
Location: Production datacenter

Hardware Status:
- Primary disk array failed - RAID controller error
- System unresponsive to ping
- Data center technician dispatched
- Failover to secondary system in progress

Data Center Response:
- Physical inspection required
- Estimated hardware replacement: 4-6 hours

119.title: Database: Query performance degradation
119.description:
Database Performance Issue

Issue: Slow query performance

Performance Metrics:
- Average query time increased from 50ms to 5s
- Lock wait timeouts increasing
- Table scan operations detected on large tables
- Connection pool at 82% capacity

Actions:
- Analyzing slow query log
- Index optimization required
- Query plan review in progress

120.title: Emergency: Network partition detected
120.description:
CRITICAL NETWORK OUTAGE

Impact: Complete network connectivity loss
Users Affected: 996+

Network Status:
- All traffic to datacenter timing out
- BGP route flapping detected
- Multiple availability zones affected
- Primary and backup paths both down

Network Team Actions:
- ISP escalation opened
- Traffic being rerouted through backup datacenter
- Estimated restoration: 2-4 hours

121.title: Critical: Server hardware failure
121.description:

Impact: Complete system failure
Location: Production datacenter

- Data center technician dispatched
- Failover to secondary system in progress

Data Center Response:
- Physical inspection required
- Estimated hardware replacement: 4-6 hours
